review_details:
Friendly and informative captain, Giorgos. Enjoyable net-fishing experience followed by a sumptuous buffet on board (which included our catch of red mullet - delicious!).

Also included swimming stops and a beach stop. A top-value experience not to be missed!

Would definitely recommend - Tom and Trish
These guys seriously know pizza! Full of flavour, super fresh and delicious pasta and sides too. Hands down the best pizza in Crete!
